archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1437
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want access to my Vodafone operations manuals, reports, and other documentation via self-service, so that I don;t have to reply on email

properties.value: SC, EP: Link to external CMS or documents can be handled within SC/EP. However send/receive function for files does not exist.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
